name: Asteroid Burger: Defense Force
description:
In the not too distant future, dire conflict arose after a disagreement at a small space diner about which fast food was superior. Now the Tacosians, who claim the hamburger is an overrated form of fast food, are seeking to destroy your hamburgers for good! Will you, a mere janitor, set down the mop of floor cleansing and pick up the... mop?.. of JUSTICE?! Of course you will! After all, it's in your contract...

Asteroid Burger is wacky arcade-style action game where you must thwart aliens from stealing your hamburgers!

- 4 unique and satisfying weapons, that each serve a purpose and can be combo'd together for explosive results!

- Feed customers with the food cannon while keeping enemies at bay. Sometimes the risky shots are just the break you need to pull ahead!

- Enjoyable skill curve! Gently eases in new players, but provides a lot of depth to push your skills further the more you play!

- Gamepad support, with both xbox and playstation button prompts.

- Endless gameplay, but how long can you stay in the game to get that massive highscore?!

- Appropriate for all ages! (Only minor cartoon violence)

- Local high scores, challenge your friends! Great for game rooms, and parties!

The game is currently windows only, but I'm looking at getting a linux version out soon, contact me if you're using linux to let me know how much interest there is!
